channel.title: Docker on Derek Morash
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Derek Morash

item.title: Rails 5 Shopify App With Redis Sidekiq Docker
item.description: Goals Create a new Rails 5 app Use the shopify_app gem for app architecture and API access Redis and Sidekiq for jobs Develop locally with the app contained in Docker Prerequisites Experience with Ruby and Rails Updated versions of Ruby, Rails, and Docker.
